name: Gmail - remove ads and misc
description:
Gmail ads remover. Beside ads it's posible to remove header, chat box, invite box, footer completely or partially.
I used a code from http://userstyles.org/styles/15636 .
additional_info:
REMOVE // TO ENABLE ITEMS.
Only ads hiding is enabled by default.
v1.1 - 3.6.2011. added option of removing ads below emails
v1.2 - 13.11.2011. removing ads adjusted to new gmail interface
